reqs: "Petersburg: Text and Cityscape - The Venice of the North, the most intentional city in the world. This class will provide a trip through St Petersburgs history and culture via its literature and film, from the 18th century to the present, from Pushkin to Putin. Includes texts by Pushkin, Gogol, Bely, Akhmatova, and Brodsky, among others and films by Pudkovkin and Sokurov.
courseName: Imagining Location in Russian Literature (in English)
